mapper.update: update sys_role set role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_type = #{roleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id_, role_name, dept_id, role_type, enable_, remark_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_role where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
